name: Dienasty
description:
This is game developed for Ludum Dare 39 - Running out of Power

You are a king who is running out of power and you are trying to hold your fort from attack both internal and external. Carefully use your resources to defend the wall.

How to Play

  • Add archers to the wall or Castle. Each structure can hold a max of 4 archers.
  • Archers die over time and so be sure to check the wall carefully.
  • Food is an important resource to balance in order to avoid internal conflicts.
  • Repair structure to keep them healthy
  • Survive as long as you can
